Lamia:

Lamia started to leave the Maximal base a, she had taken refuge in =
Maximal's base deep's but it was the time to leave the place and rejoin the=
 minions


From: Super Cyclonus 
Sent: Tuesday, February 16, 2010 4:03 PM
T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: The Old Maximal Base/Unicron's come=
 back


  
>> "Kenzo to team," he said into the radio. 
>> "Looks like we h=
ave 12 cycles before our
>> guest in the CR chamber awakens."
>
> Talon:
>
=
> "We have to be sure that some minion pest
> doesnt be near of our fellow"=
said Talon

"Acknowledged." came Legacy's icy tones across the channel afte=
r Talon had spoken.
"Chronologically speaking no one survived the destructi=
on of this base
in my original time line, although I do have records of sev=
eral
individuals that had died here presumably in its defense."

"It will b=
e fascinating to see what interesting permutation will result from . . . "
=

Legacy's head snapped up as if he were looking at something on the other s=
ide of the ceiling, his next words, while still calm and cold, were a littl=
e more clipped as they came across the Maximal channels, "We are under atta=
ck! PREPARE"

. . . . . . . . . . 

Meanwhile up above, as Legacy was sound=
ing the alarm the massive form of Marauder appeared in the skies! 

Giant w=
ings beat the air lazily as he dropped out of the skies. His body was well =
defended, covered as it were in thick ice blue and black armored plates. Hi=
s entire frame was thick and powerful, mute testimony to his function, to b=
ring war and destruction! Powerful claws hung not only from his feet but al=
so from the tips of his wings ready to snatch and rend anything that close =
enough. Behind him, Marauder's powerful long tail trailed, looking ready sm=
ash and crush, although the rear most section almost looked as if it could =
retract to extend perhaps a cannon, or a blade. However to his front was pe=
rhaps his more unique feature. Instead of a single draconic head, there wer=
e two, both of them grinning as the great beast descended! 

"You have what=
 is mine!" said on of the heads, "You will release your minion captive, or =
you will be destroyed!" said the other. 

It is quite obvious that at the m=
oment this Marauder was unaware that there were two . . . or perhaps more m=
inions here. 

(TAG)

Preston
(Legacy/Marauder)
